full_summary:
#### Tender Opportunity
# W6897-230072 - Preventive Maintenance and Repairs of Overhead Doors at CFB Suffield, Alberta

## Request for Standing Offer
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a contractor under a Standing Offer Agreement (SOA) to provide Preventive Maintenance assessment/service of overhead doors, emergency repairs, and requisitioned repair work on an as and when required basis at CFB Suffield, Ralston, Alberta.

## Tender Details
* Tender Reference No.: WS4087503560-Doc4087558245
* Tender Title: W6897-230072 - Preventive Maintenance and Repairs of Overhead Doors
* Tender Publication Date: July 9, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: August 8, 2023, at 14:00 hours
* Expected Contract Start Date: August 31, 2023

## Key Contract Requirements
The contractor shall provide all labor, materials, tools, equipment, transportation, and supervision necessary to complete the required work. The Offeror must be located within a 100 km radius of Ralston, Alberta.

## Selection Criteria
* The selection of the contractor shall be based on the lowest price.

## Classification
The UNSPSC code for this contract opportunity is 72152400 (Window and door installation and erection services).

## Trade Agreements
This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Notice URL
For more information, please visit: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16811186?extsite=MTY4MTExODZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

## Points of Contact
* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) - 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* Alex Tikhonovitch, PSPC - alex.tikhonovitch@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
